question:
you are planning to go and study English at a school overseas. you would like some information about their courses. 
Write a letter to the school. In your letter. 
 . ask about the school
 . say what kind of accommodation you want
 . mention any special requests you have (for example diet)
text: My name is Luna from India, I have recently registered as a student of your school in Melbourne for the following four-week course of Advanced English course, it will start at the end of October  this year.  I would like to ask about your school's performance than other schools, fees structure and syllabus too. I would be grateful if you could send the details about the school.

I expect the accommodation near to your academy because I do not like to much more travel. I would like to stay with the host family because I think that will be helpful for learning English like a native speaker, this will helpful for our academic performance too. That's why I will expect this.
I am following a diet here for several months and I could be continued there also when I will reach. I would be grateful if you could arrange the facilities for my diet accommodation.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
